items.title: Do you charge for this service?
items.content: No fees are charged for introductions or coordination. Any costs related to professional services are discussed and agreed directly with the relevant professional or business.

items.title: Who is this for?
items.content: This service is intended for newcomers, expats, international clients, and businesses seeking trusted local contacts in Malta. It is also suitable for locals who value clarity, discretion, and reliable introductions.

items.title: Can an NDA be signed before sharing information?
items.content: Yes. A non-disclosure agreement can be signed before any sensitive information is shared or before a meeting takes place, where required.

items.title: Are you based in Malta?
items.content: Yes. The team is locally based in Malta, with on-the-ground knowledge and established relationships across key sectors.

items.title: How are meetings arranged?
items.content: Meetings can be held in person in Malta, via video call, phone call, or through messaging platforms such as WhatsApp, depending on preference.

items.title: What happens after the introduction?
items.content: You may deal directly with the professional or business introduced. Ongoing involvement can be provided if a local point of contact or representative is required.

items.title: Do you provide legal, financial, or investment advice?
items.content: No. This service provides introductions only. All legal, financial, banking, or crypto advice is delivered by licensed professionals.

items.title: Is my information kept confidential?
items.content: Yes. All enquiries are handled discreetly and confidentially, and information is shared only when necessary.
